subject: Boxing
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Noriko Kariya, sister of hockey star Paul Kariya, is a Vancouver-born bantamweight boxer who built a 9-1 record as an amateur, turned pro in 2005 and has fought five times this year.
snippet: Noriko Kariya, sister of hockey star Paul Kariya, is a Vancouver-born bantamweight boxer who built a 9-1 record as an amateur, turned pro in 2005 and has fought five times this year.
